1.name: The Harder They Fall
1.description: Down-on-his-luck ex-sportswriter Eddie Willis is hired by shady fight promoter Nick Benko to promote his latest find, an unknown but easily exploitable phenom from Argentina.

2.name: Tea and Sympathy
2.description: Tom Lee is a sensitive boy of 17 whose lack of interest in the "manly" pursuits of sports, mountain climbing and girls labels him "sister-boy" at the college he is attending. Head master ...                See full summary »

3.name: The Ten Commandments
3.description: The Egyptian Prince, Moses, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

4.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
4.description: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

5.name: The Bad Seed
5.description: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight-year-old daughter is a heartless killer.

6.name: Forbidden Planet
6.description: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

7.name: The Searchers
7.description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

8.name: Giant
8.description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

9.name: War and Peace
9.description: Napoleon's (Herbert Lom's) tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

10.name: The Killing
10.description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five man team to plan and execute a daring race-track robbery.

11.name: Godzilla, King of the Monsters!
11.description: A 400-foot (122-meter) dinosaur-like beast, awoken from undersea hibernation off the Japanese coast by atomic-bomb testing, attacks Tokyo.

12.name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
12.description: An American physician and his wife take matters into their own hands after assassins planning to execute a foreign Prime Minister kidnap their son.

13.name: The First Texan
13.description: Eastern lawyer Sam Houston moves to Texas. At the request of President Jackson, he leads the Texan independence movement and wins the decisive battle against the Mexican army to gain Texas independence.

14.name: Moby Dick
14.description: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.

15.name: Around the World in 80 Days
15.description: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

16.name: The King and I
16.description: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

17.name: The Big Money
17.description: Petty thief Willie Frith steals a suitcase full of bank notes, only to find out that they have been given all the same serial number. But this is only the start of his troubles, now he has ...                See full summary »

18.name: Et Dieu... créa la femme
18.description: In sunny St. Tropez, a young sexpot loves one brother but marries the other.

19.name: The Werewolf
19.description: Two scientists come across an auto accident and find an unconscious man in the wreck. They take him back to their lab and inject him with a serum they have been working with. Unfortunately,...                See full summary »

20.name: Crashing Las Vegas
20.description: An electric shock enables Sach to predict numbers.

21.name: Lust for Life
21.description: The life of brilliant but tortured artist Vincent van Gogh.

22.name: High Society
22.description: A spoiled heiress must choose among three suitors: her jazz musician ex-husband, a stuffy businessman, and an undercover tabloid reporter.

23.name: The Conqueror
23.description: Mongol chief Temujin battles against Tartar armies and for the love of the Tartar princess Bortai. Temujin becomes the emperor Genghis Khan.

24.name: Picnic
24.description: Emotions are ignited amongst the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labour Day picnic.

25.name: Love Me Tender
25.description: At the end of the Civil War, a Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union payroll train but the war ends leaving these men with their Union loot, until the Feds come looking for it.

26.name: The Wrong Man
26.description: In 1953, an innocent man named Christopher Emmanuel "Manny" Balestrero is arrested after being mistaken for an armed robber.

27.name: Baby Doll
27.description: A steamy tale of two Southern rivals and a sensuous nineteen-year-old virgin.

28.name: Bob le flambeur
28.description: After losing big, an aging gambler decides to assemble a team to rob a casino.

29.name: Doublecross
29.description: A Cornish poacher clashes with dangerous international spies.

30.name: Anastasia
30.description: An opportunistic Russian businessman tries to pass a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia. But she is so convincing in her performance that even the biggest skeptics believe her.

31.name: Un condamné à mort s'est échappé ou Le vent souffle où il veut
31.description: A captured French Resistance fighter during WWII engineers a daunting escape from a Nazi prison in France.

32.name: A Town Like Alice
32.description: A newly wealthy English woman returns to Malaya to build a well for the villagers who helped her during war. Thinking back, she recalls the Australian man who made a great sacrifice to aid her and her fellow prisoners of war.

33.name: The Battle of the River Plate
33.description: In the first major naval battle of World War II, the British Navy must find and destroy a powerful German warship.

34.name: Bus Stop
34.description: A naive but stubborn cowboy falls in love with a saloon singer and tries to take her away against her will to get married and live on his ranch in Montana.

35.name: Earth vs. the Flying Saucers
35.description: Extraterrestrials traveling in high-tech flying saucers contact a scientist as part of a plan to enslave the inhabitants of Earth.

36.name: Written on the Wind
36.description: Alcoholic playboy Kyle Hadley marries the woman secretly loved by his poor but hard-working best friend, who in turn is pursued by Kyle's nymphomaniac sister.

37.description: In a totalitarian future society, Winston Smith (Edmond O'Brien), whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

38.name: Somebody Up There Likes Me
38.description: Boxer Rocky Graziano's biopic, based on his autobiography, from childhood to his World Middleweight Championship title win at age 28 in 1947.

39.name: D-Day the Sixth of June
39.description: En route to Normandy, an American and a British officer reminisce in flashback about their romances with the same woman.

40.name: 7th Cavalry
40.description: An officer accused of cowardice volunteers to bring back General Custers's body after Little Big Horn.

41.name: While the City Sleeps
41.description: A serial killer has been killing beautiful women in New York and the new owner of a media company offers a high ranking job to the first of his senior executives who can get the earliest scoops on the case.

42.name: Friendly Persuasion
42.description: The pacifist attitude of a Quaker family is tested as a result of the American Civil War.

43.name: Notre-Dame de Paris
43.description: The timeless tale of the seductive gypsy Esmeralda and the tortured hunchback Quasimodo.

44.name: The Man Who Never Was
44.description: True story of a British attempt to trick the enemy into weakening Sicily's defenses before the 1943 attack, using a dead man with faked papers.

45.name: The Swan
45.description: Princess Beatrice's days of enjoying the regal life are numbered unless her only daughter, Princess Alexandra, makes a good impression on a distant cousin when he pays a surprise visit to ...                See full summary »

46.name: Carousel
46.description: Fifteen years after his death, a carousel barker is granted permission to return to Earth for one day to make amends to his widow and their daughter.

47.name: The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit
47.description: An ex-soldier faces ethical questions as he tries to earn enough to support his wife and children well.

48.name: The Creature Walks Among Us
48.description: A scientist captures the Creature and turns him into an air-breather, only for him to escape and start killing.

49.name: Sora no daikaijû Radon
49.description: A large mining accident sets loose prehistoric Insects and giant pterosaur's on Japan.

50.name: Gervaise
50.description: Gervaise Macquart, a young lame laundress, is left by her lover Auguste Lantier with two boys... She manages to make it, and a few years later she marries Coupeau, a roofer. After working ...                See full summary »
